description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. Item 1, GSIN: N8120, NSN 8120-01-564-2612, Cylinder, Compressed Gas, Air, Breathing  Part No.: 4055699, NCAGE: 075F1 – Draeger Inc Quantity: 1354, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB Halifax
full_summary:
directories : File Listing

Tender Notice
-------------
### Brief Description
The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of compressed gas cylinders for air breathing.

### Tender Details

| **Category** | **Description** | **Quantity** | **Unit of Issue** | **Delivery Location** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Cylinder, Compressed Gas, Air Breathing | Item 1 (CSIN: N8120) | 1354 | EA |  Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax |
| Cylinder, Compressed Gas, Air Breathing | Item 2 (CSIN: N8120) | 903 | EA |  CFB Esquimalt |

### Bidding Requirements

*   Bids must be submitted in Canadian currency.
*   Only equivalent or substitute products are accepted; must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
*   Submissions in either official language of Canada are accepted.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers under various trade agreements, including:

*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Solicitation and Tender Documents
Solicitation documents and amendments are accessible through the Canada Buys website:
[Tender Notice URL](#tender-url)

### Contact Information
For further information or inquiries, please contact:
- Name: Neil Trousdale
- Email: neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca

Document language: English. The effective date of purchase is indicated as 'not specified' at the time of reading. Because the group's expertise changes periodically, double-check the publisher's updates on this before usage. However, this data isn't confirmed as accurate, so always conform with the contracting department people.

!! Do not distribute, print, or copy without contract repetition notice
